scripts.build-prod-no-cache-with-version-prod: npm version patch --verbose && node ./replace.build.js && ng build --aot --build-optimizer=false --output-hashing=all --prod --base-href=./ && node ./versioning.build.js
scripts.build-prod-no-cache-with-version-qa: npm version patch --verbose && node ./replace.build.js && ng build  --aot --build-optimizer=false --output-hashing=all --configuration=qa --base-href=./ && node ./versioning.build.js
scripts.build-prod-no-cache-with-version-dev: npm version patch --verbose && node ./replace.build.js && ng build --aot --build-optimizer=false --output-hashing=all --configuration=dev --base-href=./ && node ./versioning.build.js
scripts.build-prod-no-cache-with-version-change-: npm version patch --verbose && node ./replace.build.js && ng build --aot --build-optimizer=false --output-hashing=all --prod --base-href=./ && node ./versioning.build.js && node ./change-index-file.build.js
